message: The women in the centers make clothes, handbags, jewelry and other accessories. Dawn sells the products on her website, in a handful of boutiques and at fairs. Many of the items come with tags that tell a story of a woman who made the item.

data.description: Dawn partners with centers across the world that provide employment for women, many who have been rescued from sex trafficking.
data.title: STL company hiring women rescued from sex trafficking
